alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Cass (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 12:34PM CDT until June 14 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Southern Bowie County in northeastern Texas... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1233 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Maud, or 7 miles south of New Boston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Wake Village, New Boston, Nash, Hooks, Redwater, Maud, Red Lick, Mandeville, Genoa, Leary, Mount Pleasant, Domino, Spring Hill and Pleasant Hill. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
